name: Roulette Simulator (itch) (Monkey Gaming Cage)
description:
In this game you can play Roulette - without spending money.

Features:

  • Online Account System - your Data will be saved on Microsoft Playfab
  • Online Leaderboard - fight your way to the top of the leaderboard
  • Credit & Cash System
  • Play the modes Simple, Dozen & Plein
